alert.note: Alert for Spokane (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 27 at 4:20PM PDT until May 27 at 6:45PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Northeast Washington, including the following county, Spokane. * WHEN...Until 645 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 420 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Spokane, Spokane Valley, Post Falls, Liberty Lake, Nine Mile Falls, Millwood, Dishman, Trentwood, Mead, Green Acres, Town And Country, Country Homes, Fairwood, Otis Orchards, Otis Orchards-East Farms, State Line, Opportunity, Veradale, Mica and Valleyford. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
